name: Autobahn Whisper
description:
Imagine, you are in the PagodaScope by Dr Abstract.  This NFT, Autobahn Whisper, was used for a Kraftwerk video (Autobahn), custom made for the AltspaceVR world, where people party in a virtual reality kaleidoscope - see https://account.altvr.com/channels/abstraction.  You can set the curve, speed (including reverse) and delay to give the nested noise generative art the effect of whispering! 
    
Autobahn Whisper is the second NFT to be minted that uses the ZIM JavaScript Canvas Framework at https://zimjs.com.  Inventor Dr Abstract, the ZIM Founder, is a Canadian New Media Awards winner and has been making digital gadgets since the 90s at http://danzen.com and will continue to do so until he is in the 90s so expect a long line of collectables from the inaugural member of the GadgetMinters!
